question: What is the average revenue per operation and when did this occur?
sql_query1: SELECT AVG(Revenue) AS AverageRevenuePerOperation, OperationYears FROM Operations
sql_query2: SELECT AVG(Revenue) AS AverageRevenuePerOperation, OperationMonths FROM Operations
sql_query3: SELECT AVG(Revenue) AS AverageRevenuePerOperation, OperationYears, OperationMonths FROM Operations
interpretation1: For each operation, list its average revenue and the years it took place.
interpretation2: For each operation, list its average revenue and the months it took place.
interpretation3: For each operation, list its average revenue and the years and months it took place.
sql_query_general: SELECT AVG(Revenue) AS AverageRevenuePerOperation, Duration FROM Operations

question: What is the profit per operation and when did that operation occur?
sql_query1: SELECT OperationID, (Revenue - Expenses) AS Profit, OperationYears FROM Operations
sql_query2: SELECT OperationID, (Revenue - Expenses) AS Profit, OperationMonths FROM Operations
sql_query3: SELECT OperationID, (Revenue - Expenses) AS Profit, OperationYears, OperationMonths FROM Operations
interpretation1: For each operation, list the profit and the operational year it was made.
interpretation2: For each operation, list the profit and the operational month it was made.
interpretation3: For each operation, list the profit and the operational year and month it was made.
sql_query_general: SELECT OperationID, (Revenue - Expenses) AS Profit, Duration FROM Operations
